alert.note: Alert for Coastal New Hanover; Coastal Pender; Inland New Hanover; Inland Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 12 at 5:35PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of New Hanover and eastern Pender Counties through 630 PM EST... At 534 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong showers over Wilmington, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wilmington, Wrightsville Beach, Surf City, North Masonboro Island, Figure Eight Island, Hampstead, Topsail Beach, Hightsville, Cape Fear Community College North Campus, Ashton, Wilmington International Airport, Rocky Point, Murrayville, Castle Hayne, University Of North Carolina At Wilmington, Scotts Hill, Ogden, Woodside, Mayfaire and Wrightsboro. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 404 and 416. Interstate 140 between mile markers 15 and 20. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal New Hanover; Coastal Pender; Inland New Hanover; Inland Pender
